author: Chris Martin
title: How to get Word for free: Use Microsoft Office free
text: How to get Word for free on Windows : Get Microsoft Office, Word & Excel free on your PC and laptop How to get Word for free: Use Microsoft Office free We show you how to get Word for free on Windows. You can get Microsoft Office, Word & Excel free on your PC, but there are also great free alternatives to Word and Office. Office doesn't come pre-installed but you can get it for nothing. Here's how to get Word, Excel and more free on Windows
